entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one destined to destroy He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named and is also referred to by name in the conversation.

entities.description: Potter is mentioned as a nickname for Harry.

entities.name: he-who-must-not-be-named
entities.description: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is referred to as the one that many believe Harry is destined to destroy.

entities.name: minister
entities.description: The Minister is mentioned as a title held by Scrimgeour.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is referred to by name and is the one who is being addressed by Harry.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is mentioned as someone who was killed by Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry is destined to destroy He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named, as believed by many.
